name: Recipe: Lakkaberry Madame
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Lakkaberry Madame.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Restores <color=#37ffff>20-24%</color> of Max HP to the selected character and an additional <color=#37ffff>900-1,500</color> HP.
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
10
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Lakkaberry Madame
customize.desc: A chopped chicken dish. Said to have gained real popularity in Nod-Krai, despite being an imported recipe. It has a sweet-and-sour flavor that is indeed most delectable. A different flavor, certainly, though judging by the name... was the base dish the Sweet Madame, you wonder?

customize.name: Delicious Lakkaberry Madame
customize.desc: A chopped chicken dish. The radiant amber sauce evenly coats every piece of chicken, encasing tender, juicy meat within its sweet, sticky exterior. No matter what it's paired with, this dish is sure to be scarfed down!

customize.name: Suspicious Lakkaberry Madame
customize.desc: A chopped chicken dish. The intense sourness wipes away all expectations of a pleasant meal, causing the smile to vanish instantly and the face to scrunch up in discomfort... It tastes less like a dish and more like a prank...

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Lakkaberry Madame
customize.desc: A chopped chicken dish. Said to have gained real popularity in Nod-Krai, despite being an imported recipe. It has a sweet-and-sour flavor that is indeed most delectable. A different flavor, certainly, though judging by the name... was the base dish the Sweet Madame, you wonder?

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Lakkaberry
customize.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

customize.name: Smetana
customize.desc: A dairy product produced through complex processes such as separation and fermentation. It has a smooth texture and a refreshing sourness, often serving as the finishing touch in many dishes.
